title: Houkago Dorei Club
description:
Volume 1:
1. Prologue
2. Sayaka Shingyouji
3. Ryouko Hikawa
4. Tomoko Sakurai

Volume 2:
1-2. New club member

4.  Nasty pair school festival
5.  Chiharu Masuyama and Tae Edogawa
6.  After school public toilet

Don't change chapter listing for volume 2. The manga updates one is wrong
